head.citation-title: Proceedings of the 4th International Workshop on Signal Design and Its Applications in Communications, IWSDA'09
head.abstracts: The proceedings contain 45 papers. The topics discussed include: near perfect sequences of odd length; perfect sequences over the real quaternions; a new class of quadriphase even-shift orthogonal sequences; construction of binary sequence pairs with two-level periodic autocorrelation function; on a ZCZ code including a sequence useful for synchronization; an energy saving scheduling scheme for OFDMA two-hop relay systems; a novel iterative data-aided channel estimation for time domain synchronous-OFDM; properties of the pseudo-ternary m-sequences; sum-product decoding of convolutional code for wireless LAN standard; reduced complexity-and-latency variable-to-check residual belief propagation decoding algorithms for LDPC codes; lower bounds on the periodic partial correlations of frequency hopping sequences with partial low hit zone; and design of no-hit-zone frequency-hopping sequence sets with optimal hamming autocorrelation.

source.sourcetitle-abbrev: Proc. Int. Workshop Signal Des. Appl. Commun., IWSDA
source.issuetitle: Proceedings of the 4th International Workshop on Signal Design and Its Applications in Communications, IWSDA'09
